sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-navigation-drawer permanent class="prescription-side-bar" width="100%">
    <v-container class="main-container">
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="2">
                <label class="text">Medication</label>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="10">
                <CustomInput disabled="true" class="auto-input-select-measurement"/>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="12">
                <v-textarea background-color="gray" color="gray" disabled height="100" class="disabled-text-area"></v-textarea>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="3">
                <label for="" class="text">Order Type:</label>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="9">
                <CustomSelect :items="items" />
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="3">
                <label for="" class="text">Routine Dose:</label>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="3">
                <CustomInput disabled="true" class="auto-input-select-measurement"/>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6">
                <CustomSelect :items="items" class="auto-input-select-measurement"/>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="12">
                <CustomInput type="number" value=0 class="auto-input-select-measurement"/>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="3">
                <label for="" class="text">Route</label>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="9">
                <CustomSelect :items="items" class="auto-input-select-measurement"/>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="3">
                <label for="" class="text">Direction</label>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="9">
                <CustomSelect :items="items" class="auto-input-select-measurement"/>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="3">
                <label for="" class="text">Indication</label>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="9">
                <CustomSelect :items="items" class="auto-input-select-measurement"/>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="3">
                <label for="" class="text">Start Date</label>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="9">
                <CustomSelect :items="items" class="auto-input-select-measurement"/>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="1">
                <CustomInput type="checkbox" class="auto-input-select-measurement"/>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="3">
                <label for="" class="text">Duration (Days)</label>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="8">
                <CustomSelect :items="items" class="auto-input-select-measurement"/>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="1">
                <CustomInput type="checkbox" class="auto-input-select-measurement"/>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="3">
                <label for="" class="text">Total Doses</label>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="8">
                <CustomInput type="number" value="1" class="auto-input-select-measurement"/>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="2">
                <CustomInput type="checkbox" class="auto-input-select-measurement"/>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="10">
                <label for="" class="text">Customize Dose Schedule</label>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
            <v-col cols="12">
                <label for="">Remarks:</label>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="12">
                <v-textarea background-color="white" color="transparent" label="Remarks" height="200"></v-textarea>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
    </v-navigation-drawer>
    <v-container class="prescription-main-content">
    <CustomTable height="100vh" width="100" />
    </v-container>

</template>

<script>
import CustomSelect from '@/components/Custom/CustomSelect.vue';
import CustomInput from '@/components/Custom/CustomInput.vue';
import CustomTable from '@/components/Custom/CustomTable.vue';

export default {
    name:"Prescription",
    components:{
        CustomSelect,
        CustomInput,
        CustomTable
    },
    data(){
        return{
            items:[1,2,4]
        }
    }
}
</script>
